question: If i was conceived out of wedlock and my parents are now divorced, does my father break my wudu? shukran

QUESTION

If i was conceived out of wedlock and my parents are now divorced, does my father break my wudu? shukran

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

Wudu is the washing of the limbs of the body in a specific way before performing salah. If you had performed, your father and his actions have no bearing on your wudu.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best



Wassalamu Alaykum



Mufti Ebrahim Desai
